main event: A sighting of a silvery, round, stationary object was reported on December 6, 1960, 60 meters south of Avon.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright white light and displayed occasional flashes., The object was observed at a bearing of 210° W and 212° W., The duration of the observation was 5 minutes., The observation was categorized as ground-visual., Insufficient data was noted for further evaluation.
sighted object: silvery, round, stationary object emitting a bright white light
